assignments.description: Sets TotalGoalAssignmentCount and GoalAssignmentsCompletedCount to calculate percentage for the new indicator result record.
assignments.name: SetCountVariables
assignments.label: Set Count Variables

collectionProcessors.description: Filters goal assignments to only include records that are in Completed status.
collectionProcessors.name: FilterGoalAssignments
collectionProcessors.label: Filter Goal Assignments

decisions.description: Determines if goal assignments are found.
decisions.name: FoundGoalAssignments
decisions.label: Found Goal Assignments?

decisions.description: Determines if the request includes a valid indicator performance period ID and if the indicator definition is active.
decisions.name: IndicatorRequestValidOrInvalid
decisions.label: Is Indicator Request Valid?

Flow.description: outcome management, button on indicator performance period record page launches this flow

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores the goal definition selected by the flow user.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: GoalDefinitionChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores the result type selected by the flow user.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ResultTypePicklistChoiceSet

formulas.description: Calculates how long the flow takes to run.
formulas.name: CalculateFlowRunTime

formulas.description: Calculates the percentage of goal assignments that are completed.
formulas.name: CompletionPercentageFormula

Flow.interviewLabel: Calculate Goal Completion Percent for Indicator Result {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Calculate Goal Completion Percent for Indicator Result

recordCreates.description: Creates an indicator result record using the calculated completion percentage.
recordCreates.name: CreateIndicatorResult
recordCreates.label: Create Indicator Result

recordLookups.description: Gets the flow definition that’s calculating the indicator result.
recordLookups.name: GetFlowDefinition
recordLookups.label: Get Flow Definition

recordLookups.description: Gets the goal assignments that are related to the specified goal definition and must be evaluated within the specified period.
recordLookups.name: GetGoalAssignments
recordLookups.label: Get Goal Assignments

recordLookups.description: Gets the indicator performance period record for the selected indicator definition.
recordLookups.name: GetIndicatorPerformancePeriod
recordLookups.label: Get Indicator Performance Period

recordLookups.description: Gets the indicator result records created within the last 24 hours.
recordLookups.name: GetRecentIndicatorResult
recordLookups.label: Get Recent Indicator Result

recordLookups.description: Gets the time period record with an ID that matches the IndicatorPerformancePeriodId.
recordLookups.name: GetTimePeriod
recordLookups.label: Get Time Period

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user.
screens.name: DisplayGetFlowDefinitionErrorScreen
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: GetFlowDefinitionErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong while getting the flow definition. Contact your Salesforce admin for help.

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user.
screens.name: DisplayGetIndicatorPerformancePeriodErrorScreen
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: GetIndicatorPerformancePeriodErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong while getting the indicator performance period. Contact your Salesforce admin for help.

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user.
screens.name: DisplayGetRecentIndicatorResultErrorScreen
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: GetIndicatorResultRecordErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong while getting the recent indicator result records. Contact your Salesforce admin for help.

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user.
screens.name: DisplayGetTimePeriodError
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: GetTimePeriodErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Add a valid time period to the indicator performance period related to this goal definition.

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user.
screens.name: DisplayIndicatorResultErrorScreen
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: IndicatorResultWriteErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: We couldn’t create an indicator result record. Contact your Salesforce admin for help

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user.
screens.name: GoalAssignmentErrorScreen
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: GoalAssignmentErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong while getting the goal assignments. Contact your Salesforce admin for help.

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user about a missing indicator performance period ID or an inactive indicator definition.
screens.name: IncompleteIndicatorRequestError
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: MissingIndicatorPerformancePeriodId
fields.fieldText: Enter a valid indicator performance period ID.

fields.name: IndicatorDefinitionInactive
fields.fieldText: Set the status of the indicator definition to Active.

screens.description: Displays a confirmation message to the flow user.
screens.name: IndicatorResultConfirmationScreen
screens.label: Display Confirmation

fields.name: IndicatorResultConfirmationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: We calculated the goal completion percentage for the specified goal definition and created an indicator result record.

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user.
screens.name: NoGoalAssignmentsErrorScreen
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: NoGoalAssignmentsErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: We couldn’t find any goal assignments associated with the specified goal definition. We couldn’t find any goal assignments associated with the specified goal definition. Check if there are goal assignments in the timeframe you’re measuring or make sure you have access to goal assignments.

screens.description: Displays the indicator result calculation for the flow user to review before creating the indicator result record.
screens.name: ReviewIndicatorResultCalculationScreen
screens.label: Review Indicator Result Calculation

fields.name: ReviewIndicatorResultCalculationHeaderDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Review Indicator Result Calculation

screens.description: Allows flow user to select a goal definition and result type to calculate the goal completion percentage.
screens.name: ScreenSelectGoalDefinitionResultType
screens.label: Select a Goal Definition and Result Type

fields.name: SelectGoalDefinitionResultTypeHeaderDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Select a Goal Definition and Result Type

fields.name: GoalDefinitionResultTypeContextDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Select a goal definition and an optional result type to calculate the percentage of goal assignments completed during the indicator performance period for the assigned participants.

fields.name: UserVisbilityNoteDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Results are calculated only for the records that are visible to you.

textTemplates.description: Stores the text template that contains the warning message that’s displayed when the flow user tries to calculate without an Indicator Performance Period ID.
textTemplates.name: GetIndicatorResultRecordErrorTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
error

Error: Missing Indicator Performance Period ID.

textTemplates.description: Stores the text template that contains the warning message that’s displayed when the flow user tries to calculate another indicator result.
textTemplates.name: RecentIndicatorResultWarningTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
warning

Warning: An indicator result record was created for this indicator performance period in the last 24 hours. Proceed only if you want to calculate another indicator result.

textTemplates.description: Stores the text template that contains the message that’s displayed to the flow user before creating the indicator result record.
textTemplates.name: ResultsCalculatedTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
success

Review the calculated indicator result and create the indicator result record.

variables.description: Stores the number of completed goal assignments.
variables.name: GoalAssignmentsCompletedCount

variables.description: Stores the goal definition used to create the indicator result.
variables.name: GoalDefinitionId

variables.description: Stores the indicator performance period ID associated with the indicator result that's passed into the flow.
variables.name: indicatorPerformancePeriodId

variables.description: Stores the end date for the calculation date range.
variables.name: TargetCompletionEndDate

variables.description: Stores the start date for the calculation date range.
variables.name: TargetCompletionStartDate

variables.description: Stores the number of all goal assignments.
variables.name: TotalGoalAssignmentCount
